biography.bio: Isa Günther was born on May 20, 1938 in Munich, Germany. She is an actress, known for Petite maman (1950), Vier Mädel aus der Wachau (1957) and Die Zwillinge vom Zillertal (1957).
biography.name: Isa Günther

biography.bio: Jutta Günther was born on May 20, 1938 in Munich, Germany. She is an actress, known for Petite maman (1950), Vier Mädel aus der Wachau (1957) and Die Zwillinge vom Zillertal (1957).
biography.name: Jutta Günther

biography.bio: Joachim Fuchsberger was born on March 11, 1927 in Stuttgart, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for Neues vom Wixxer (2007), Face of the Frog (1959) and The Mysterious Magician (1964). He was married to Gundula Korte and Gitta Lind. He died on September 11, 2014 in Grünwald, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Joachim Fuchsberger

biography.bio: Karin Dor was born on February 22, 1938 in Wiesbaden, Hesse, Germany as Kätherose Derr. She is an actress, known for You Only Live Twice (1967), Topaz (1969) and Winnetou: The Red Gentleman (1964). She was previously married to George Robotham, Günther Schmucker and Harald Reinl.
biography.name: Karin Dor

biography.bio: Hans Moser was born on August 6, 1880 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary as Johann Julier. He was an actor, known for Hallo Dienstmann (1952), Einmal der liebe Herrgott sein (1942) and Der Herr im Haus (1940). He was married to Blanca Moser. He died on June 19, 1964 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Hans Moser

biography.bio: Margarete Haagen was born on November 29, 1889 in Nuremberg, Bavaria, Germany. She was an actress, known for Ihr 106. Geburtstag (1958), Sous les ponts (1946) and I accuse (1941). She died on November 19, 1966 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Margarete Haagen

biography.bio: Werner Finck was born on May 2, 1902 in Görlitz, Germany. He was an actor and writer, known for Lola Montès (1955), Roses for the Prosecutor (1959) and Hurrah, the School Is Burning (1969). He was married to Eva. He died on July 31, 1978 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Werner Finck

biography.bio: Albert Rueprecht was born on July 24, 1929 in Vienna, Austria. He is an actor, known for Sissi face à son destin (1957), Song Without End (1960) and Boeing - Boeing (1964).
biography.name: Albert Rueprecht

biography.bio: Wolfgang Gruner was born on September 20, 1926 in Rathenow, Germany. He was an actor and writer, known for Babylon 69 (1969), We Cellar Children (1960) and Ready, Willing and Able (1971). He was married to Eva. He died on March 16, 2002 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Wolfgang Gruner

biography.bio: Theodor Danegger was born on August 31, 1891 in Lienz, Tyrol, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Die Schatztruhe (1948), Nuits de Vienne (1939) and Das Ferienkind (1943). He died on October 11, 1959 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Theodor Danegger

biography.bio: Viktor Afritsch was born on March 23, 1906 in Graz, Styria, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Die Gottes Mühlen (1938), Es lebe die Liebe (1944) and The Comedians (1941). He was married to Josefine Ascherl. He died on March 9, 1967 in Berchtesgaden, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Viktor Afritsch

biography.bio: Franz Loskarn was born on May 3, 1890 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. He was an actor, known for Königlich Bayerisches Amtsgericht (1969), Ein Herz schlägt für dich (1949) and The Hunter of Fall (1936). He died on April 23, 1978 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Franz Loskarn

biography.bio: Luitgard Diesch is an actress, known for Mein Schatz ist aus Tirol (1958) and Die Zwillinge vom Zillertal (1957).
biography.name: Luitgard Diesch

biography.bio: Alice Kessler was born on August 20, 1936 in Nerchau, Saxony, Germany. She is an actress, known for Alice und Ellen (1971), Il giovedi (1964) and Zu jung um blond zu sein (1961).
biography.name: Alice Kessler

biography.bio: Ellen Kessler was born on August 20, 1936 in Nerchau, Saxony, Germany. She is an actress, known for Alice und Ellen (1971), Il giovedi (1964) and Erik the Conqueror (1961).
biography.name: Ellen Kessler
